name: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI's conversational AI model designed for natural language understanding and generation, capable of answering questions, writing content, and assisting with various tasks.

meta.title: ChatGPT Review 2025 - Features, Pricing & Alternatives | SiteOptz

cons: Can be expensive for heavy usage
Sometimes generates confident but incorrect information
Limited free tier with GPT-3.5 only
No real-time internet access in basic version

pricing.details: Access to GPT-3.5, limited availability during peak times
GPT-4 access, faster response times, priority access
Everything in Plus, higher message caps, admin console
Unlimited GPT-4, advanced admin controls, SSO, dedicated support
